sourcesContent:
import dollarUSLocaleNoDigits from "../../utils/dollarUSLocaleNoDigits"; const OutputsTCO = ({ gasZTR, cashPurchase, NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram }) => { return (
  • Gas ZTR
  • {dollarUSLocaleNoDigits.format(gasZTR.TCOofGasZTR)}
  • NGBR
  • + batteries & chargers
  • {dollarUSLocaleNoDigits.format( cashPurchase.TCOofNGBR )}
  • with FPP
  • {dollarUSLocaleNoDigits.format( NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram.depreciationOfBareNGBR + NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram.flexiblePowerProgramSubscription + cashPurchase.power + cashPurchase.maintenance )}
  • with 36-month financing
  • {dollarUSLocaleNoDigits.format( NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram.depreciationOfBareNGBR + NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram.financingFee36 + cashPurchase.power + cashPurchase.maintenance )}
  • with 48-month financing
  • {dollarUSLocaleNoDigits.format( NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram.depreciationOfBareNGBR + NGBRWithFlexiblePowerProgram.financingFee48 + cashPurchase.power + cashPurchase.maintenance )}
); }; export default OutputsTCO;
